trans-unit.source: Manages a <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> instance for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Gere um <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> instância para o utilizador atual.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerModule class is used to assign a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de RoleManagerModule é utilizada para atribuir um <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>para a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: When a request completes, the RoleManagerModule refreshes the roles cookie that contains cached role information.
trans-unit.target: Quando um pedido de conclusão, o RoleManagerModule atualiza o cookie de funções que contém informações de função em cache.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property is of type <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>, and that <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> indicates that its cached role list has been modified by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A> property to `true`, the RoleManagerModule will update the roles cookie that contains cached role information.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>é propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>e que <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>indica que a respetiva lista de função em cache foi modificada, definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A>propriedade `true`, o RoleManagerModule atualizará o cookie de funções que contém informações de função em cache.</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class is used to place a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe é utilizada para colocar um <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>no <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: Called by the HTTP runtime to dispose of the role-manager module.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo runtime HTTP eliminar o módulo de Gestor de funções.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> so the memory it occupied can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>pelo que pode ser reclamada a memória que ocupado pela libertação.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.

trans-unit.source: A global application event that is raised when the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> is ready to create a <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> that represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Um evento de aplicação global que é gerado quando o <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> está pronto para criar um <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref> que representa o utilizador atual.

trans-unit.source: The GetRoles event is raised before the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> creates a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and assigns it to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: O evento GetRoles é desencadeado antes do <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>cria um <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objeto e atribui-o para a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to audit when role information is applied or to replace the creation of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own code.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para auditar quando são aplicadas a informações de função ou para substituir a criação de um <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>com o seu próprio código.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the application of role information by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> to `true` in the GetRoles event.
trans-unit.target: Pode cancelar a aplicação de informações de função pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>definindo a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs>para `true` no evento GetRoles.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A> to `true` in your GetRoles event handler, then the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> is not set to a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>para `true` no seu GetRoles o processador de eventos, em seguida, a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade de atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>é não definida para um <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objeto por <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs.RolesPopulated%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Associates the role manager with the specified application.
trans-unit.target: Associa o Gestor de funções com a aplicação especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method subscribes to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthorizeRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> methods of the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> for the purpose of managing role information and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método subscreve o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthorizeRequest>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>métodos de especificado <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>com o objetivo de gerir informações de função e não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthorizeRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> to associate the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> para associar o <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> com.
